origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'PolicyAPI.get_timeline', 'description': 'This function provides a timeline of policy changes and market openings for specified financial markets and policy types.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'market', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the financial market, e.g., China financial markets.'}, {'name': 'policyType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of policy change or market opening, e.g., openness.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'timeline', 'description': 'A detailed timeline of policy changes and market openings.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 PolicyAPI.get_timeline, 它的参数输入如下: 'market'是'China financial markets', 'policyType'是'openness'.
